foxtrot.pumps

Class SunJDK17ConditionalEventPump

  • java.lang.Object
    • foxtrot.pumps.ConditionalEventPump
      • foxtrot.pumps.SunJDK14ConditionalEventPump
        • foxtrot.pumps.SunJDK141ConditionalEventPump
          • foxtrot.pumps.SunJDK17ConditionalEventPump
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventPump, EventFilterable

    public class SunJDK17ConditionalEventPump
extends SunJDK141ConditionalEventPump
    Specialized ConditionalEventPump for Sun's JDK 7.0. Differently from previous releases, the locking involved is now based on Locks instead of using the synchronized keyword.

    • Method Detail

      • waitForEvent

        protected AWTEvent waitForEvent()
        Description copied from class: SunJDK14ConditionalEventPump
        Flushes pending events before waiting for the next event. There is a mismatch between the behavior of EventQueue.getNextEvent() and EventQueue.peekEvent(): the first always flushes pending events, the second does not. This missing flushing is the reason why peekEvent() returns null causing the proxy implementation of Conditional.evaluate() to never return
        Overrides:
        waitForEvent in class SunJDK14ConditionalEventPump
